programme.title: Days Of Wrath
programme.desc: A hard, cold, ruthless killer teaches a young man the rules of a life dedicated to violence and based on the speed of a gun. The young man later denies that lifestyle and the two stalk each other throughout the town in a climactic duel to the death.

programme.title: Paper Tiger
programme.desc: A somewhat prim and proper Englishman is hired as the tutor to the son of the Japanese ambassador. His life changes when he and the boy are kidnapped by terrorists for political purposes.

programme.title: Compañeros
programme.desc: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

programme.title: Days Of Wrath
programme.desc: A hard, cold, ruthless killer teaches a young man the rules of a life dedicated to violence and based on the speed of a gun. The young man later denies that lifestyle and the two stalk each other throughout the town in a climactic duel to the death.

programme.title: Paper Tiger
programme.desc: A somewhat prim and proper Englishman is hired as the tutor to the son of the Japanese ambassador. His life changes when he and the boy are kidnapped by terrorists for political purposes.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: Professionals for a Massacre
programme.desc: Caught selling stolen guns, three Confederate soldiers get a reprieve from the firing squad, provided they go into Mexico on a mission to recover stolen gold belonging to the Confederacy.

programme.title: Deadly Impact
programme.desc: An action thriller about an illegal gambling operation that transitions into a deadly gamble for life.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. programme.desc: An action thriller about an illegal gambling operation that transitions into a deadly gamble for life.

programme.title: Sonny Boy
programme.desc: A small-town crime boss accepts delivery of a stolen car, only to find there's a baby in the back-seat. He and his transgender wife cut out the boy's tongue and raise him as a mute accomplice in their crimes. When the grown "Sonny Boy" escapes and tries to make contact with the outside world, the attention he draws to his warped family results in darkly-humored mayhem.

programme.title: Professionals for a Massacre
programme.desc: Caught selling stolen guns, three Confederate soldiers get a reprieve from the firing squad, provided they go into Mexico on a mission to recover stolen gold belonging to the Confederacy.

programme.title: Chasing Secrets
programme.desc: A young white girl abused by her grandfather finds happiness when she's taken under the wing of an older black couple. The girl's mother struggles to overcome the family's problems.

programme.title: On the Streets of L.A.
programme.desc: An estranged father and son are paroled from the same maximum-security prison with one unusual condition: they must become roommates and are forced to depend on each other.

programme.title: Bank Robber
programme.desc: After robbing a bank, Billy hides out from the police in a seedy hotel where he is forced to bribe various tenants for their silence. Soon the tenants begin to up the price for their trouble.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: En route to a photoshoot, fashion model Vicky veers off the road and flips her car in the heart of the African bush. She struggles to survive in the wilderness, with only her own demons for company.

programme.title: Mike Hammer, Private Eye
programme.desc: Mike Hammer attempts to investigate the dumping of toxic chemicals in the Hudson River. While searching for the real culprit, a journalist winds up dead and Hammer begins to suspect his own client.

programme.title: Mr. Lucky
programme.desc: Mr. Lucky becomes the focus of an IRS investigation, triggered by a business owner who has cooked the books and is tossing a red herring in his direction.

programme.title: Harts of the West
programme.desc: Sheriff R.O. looks for clues leading to a suspect in the murder of Garral's most beloved bovine, Irene, who dropped dead while Garral was painting her portrait.

programme.title: Peter Gunn
programme.desc: Gunn is hired by a mystery woman to deliver a briefcase. A bigger mystery is what is in the briefcase and who will kill to get it? Lt. Jacoby and Gunn find the answers involve a "dead" man.

programme.title: Tropical Heat
programme.desc: The 6th Duke of Stowbridge accidentally murders his lover. No one knows about it except his wife who, fearing for her own safety, ends up asking Nick for help.

programme.title: Spike Team
programme.desc: The girls face their fears when the hit the court for the first match of the Alea Cup. The pressure is high and the competition is fierce, but all that's left to do is Spike It!

programme.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood
programme.sub-title: The Challenge of the Black Knight
programme.desc: Ned Dale, an outlaw, takes his son Will hunting with Little John as a special birthday treat. While on their trip, the group is challenged by a knight clad entirely in black armor.

programme.title: The Buccaneers
programme.desc: As New Providence recovers from a hurricane, word comes through that a Spanish treasure ship has sunk nearby. Tempest decides to try and recover the gold as a way to finance the town's rebuilding.

programme.title: The Adventures of Sir Lancelot
programme.desc: Lancelot and Brian head off to Ireland to compete in a tournament representing King Arthur. On the way, they come across a rhyming bandit with lots of enemies who is loved by a princess.

programme.title: The Lost World
programme.desc: Empress Centuria orders her Lizardmen to capture Tribune. When her soldiers find him at the treehouse, he, Malone, Marguerite, and Roxton are imprisoned, and thrown into the Gladiators' Arena.

programme.title: Matt and Jenny
programme.desc: While traveling, Matt, Jenny, and Cardston encounter a young woman who is about to give birth. She is a homesteader and her husband is a suspected deserter from the military.

programme.title: Star Games
programme.desc: Forced from his planet by an alien takeover, a young prince takes intergalactic flight. He finds refuge on Earth and befriends a boy named Brian. Together, they fight for the freedom of the galaxy.

programme.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice
programme.desc: Ben yearns to learn magic from his new neighbor Milner, who hesitates to help him as he carries the same scar as the original bearer of an ancient staff that was wielded in battle centuries ago.

programme.title: Terminus
programme.desc: In a dystopian future, a sport is played with a computer-driven truck with the aim of reaching Terminus, a secret base. However, none of the players realize a different game is being played.

programme.title: Merlin: The Return
programme.desc: Under Merlin's spell, evil sorcerer Mordred has been imprisoned for centuries. When a meddlesome scientist from the present creates a gateway for Mordred to escape, good and evil battle once again.

programme.title: Boggy Creek II: And the Legend Continues
programme.desc: Dr. Lockhart gets a call from the sheriff reporting a Bigfoot-like creature in a secluded town in Southwest Arkansas. Lockart brings along three students from the university to help investigate.

programme.title: Race to Mars
programme.desc: The story of six individuals who have been selected for a grueling two-year mission and the greatest human exploration of this century--the first mission to Mars.

programme.title: Race to Mars
programme.desc: The crew lands on Mars, but Hiromi is injured in the process. Terra Nova's equipment is wearing out faster than anticipated, so they seek permission to use a Chinese drill to complete their work.

programme.title: Race to Mars
programme.desc: It's a moral quandary: do the astronauts accept possible death from this undiagnosed disease or face a possible lifetime of quarantine on Earth if they are contagious?
